COEW - Community order England / Wales
Community order made. The defendant must comply with the requirements (shown below) by 11/12/2025.

offences.offenceLegislation: Contrary to section 8(1) of the Theft Act 1968.

offences.wording: From 13th November 2018, an aggravated version of this offence applies where the offence is committed against an emergency worker acting in the exercise of his / her functions as such a worker, as per section 1 of the Assaults on emergency Workers (Offences) Act 2018; see offence wording document H19568.

judicialResults.label: Suspended sentence order - imprisonment
judicialResults.resultText:
SUSPS - Suspended sentence order - imprisonment
Committed to prison for 6 Years suspended for 3 Years. Reason: failure to comply with requirements of post custodial sentence supervision. The defendant must comply with the requirements within the supervision period.  In the event of activation of sentence: 55 bail remand days to count. Total custodial period 6 Years. Supervision period: 4 Years.

judicialResults.resultText:
RR - Residence
RR - Residence
Residence Requirement: Live at test address for 6 Years.
